Objects.Label: recycling bin for paper
Relations: left to; recycling bin for plastic

Objects.Label: recycling bin for plastic
Relations: right to; recycling bin for paper

Scene description: The scene depicts a table placed on the floor with two recycling bins on either side. The left bin is designated for paper and the right bin for plastic and metals. On the table, there is a green can positioned in front of the bins, along with a white cloth, a blue object, and a pair of red gloves, all arranged from left to right.
